entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight then northeast 30 before morning. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
